properties.entry:
Survey

Before we continue to the next round of the token task, we would like to ask you some quick questions. Please click here to begin the survey.

This was the last round, but not the end of the experiment. We will now determine your payments. While we are doing this, we request that you carefully fill out a brief survey.

When we are ready we will call you one by one to the room next door. We will pay you there in private. Please wait until your computer number is called, and then proceed to the room next door to turn in your computer number and your survey.

Please answer the survey carefully and thank you for participating.
